posts.title: PageRank and RWR
posts.text: 写在前面 看到一篇paper里用RWR (random walk with restart)，顺便把PageRank过一遍儿。* 已知-输入-输出 已知 1，N 个网页， 2，网页间链接矩阵A\in R^{N*N}(可以类似马氏链的状态转移矩阵)。 3，PageRank：网页的重要性(被用户访问到的可能性) 用向量 B=(b_{1},b_{2},...,{b_{N}})^{T} 表示。

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick Starty=wx_{1}+bCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
